product_name: Keen Clearwater CNX Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Do your adventures take you in and out of the water? The women's Keen Clearwater CNX Sandals drain and dry quickly, and feature rubber toe guards to protect you while crossing streams and rivers. Water-friendly and lightweight polyester webbing uppers wash easily; pull loops facilitate easy on-and-off. Uppers are laced with elastic cords and secure with cordlocks for a comfortable, easily adjustable fit. Patented rubber toe guards protect feet from scuffs, bumps and uneven terrain. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from the feet for all-day comfort. Contoured topsoles feature metatarsal ridges just behind the toes for enhanced fit and feel; molded arches supply light support. Thin polyurethane midsoles have a 4mm heel-to-toe drop to encourage natural movement while also offering light cushioning underfoot. Thermoplastic urethane shanks supply stability and support for tackling uneven terrain. Nonmarking rubber outsoles on the Keen Clearwater CNX sandals feature multidirectional lugs with razor siping for improved traction on wet surfaces. Please note: As part of the Keen CNX line, these sandals have a slightly reduced width and overall volume compared to regular Keen sandals to provide a better-connected fit. Closeout.
short_description: Do your adventures take you in and out of the water? The women's Keen Clearwater CNX Sandals drain and dry quickly, and feature rubber toe guards to protect you while crossing streams and rivers.
